name: INFOWAR (Verianno)
description:
Hello!

The project is my first solo game! It has been inspired by my life, like millions of other Ukrainian lives since February 24, 2022.

With this game, I would like to show the world a bit of our daily routine, if you are lucky enough to live in a "calm" city of my country.

For you it's just a fun game, but for us it's a sad reality...

Slava Ukraini!

Game Rules:

Survive as long as you can. Don't let your stress level reach 100 (red progress bar) and don't ignore alert signal - it may cost you life!

Information (green progress bar) is a key: read the news and watch TV. But remember that information may provoke stress if you know too much ot too less. Don't forget to sleep in bed - it may help you to drop down your stress!

Controls:

  • LMB - pick paper (interaction with the table is required)
  • A, D - move left or right
  • W - interact
  • S - leave a table
  • Esc - end attemp
